oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Allen-White School: front view 2
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 100 Allen Extension Road, Whiteville, Hardeman Co., TN
Color photograph of brick building with white doors and six boarded windows
Allen-White School was constructed with funding from the Rosenwald Fund. It later became associated with the El Canaan Baptist Church
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Julius Rosenwald Fund -- Buildings; School buildings -- Tennessee
Schools
